| \b\*A Better Node.js REPL\s\s


---

| Who Am I?


---

| \b\*stdlib\s\s
\s

--

| standard library for JavaScript and Node.js

--

\s
| \b\*numerical\s\s and \b\*scientific\s\s computing applications


---

| \_\*Standard Library\s\s


---

| \_utilities\s

• \rgroupBy\s

```
function indicator( v ) {
    if ( v[ 0 ] === 'b' ) {
        return 'b';
    }
    return 'other';
};
var collection = [ 'beep', 'boop', 'foo', 'bar' ];
var out = groupBy( collection, indicator )
```


---

• \rpluck\s

```
var arr = [
    { 'a': 1, 'b': 2 },
    { 'a': 0.5, 'b': 3 }
];
var out = pluck( arr, 'a' )
```


---

| \_Data Structures\_

• \rLinkedList\s
• \rDoublyLinkedList\s
• \rStack\s
• \rFIFO\s
• ...


---

• consistent interfaces

--

• unified documentation

--

• tests, benchmarks, examples


---

| \_\*Scientific Computing\s\s
\s

--

• special math functions
  • \rbase.sin\s

--

• low-level linear algebra
  • \rbase.daxpy\s

--

• pseudorandom number generators (PRNGs)
  • \rbase.random\s

--

• statistics
  • \rbase.dists\s

--

• machine learning
  • \rincrkmeans\s

--

• natural language processing
  • \rporterStemmer\s

--

• plotting
  • \rplot\s
